title: HELP
body: i got a punishment and it told me to check email but i didnt get any email. any suggestion?

replies.body: a person in that game was pissing me off so i was feeding and i got a 14day ban. and it was the first time too. the person that was pissing me off didnt get penalty.

I definitely recommend you check your filtered inbox (such as spam) for the email. If you don't see it there, reach out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can provide context around the suspension.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'd say give it a day at best. If you still haven't received one after that, then sending in a ticket would be the next best suggestion I can offer.

Did you check in spam inbox? Alternatively, contact Player Support and they will give you more context:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
